title: government_credential_registry
description: Registry for digital copies of government-issued documents and credentials

holderName.description: Full name of the credential holder

issuingAuthority.description: Government authority that issued the document

issueDate.description: Date when the document was issued

expiryDate.description: Expiry date of the document (if applicable)

verificationStatus.description: Current verification status of the document

digitalSignature.description: Digital signature or hash of the original document

isActive.description: Whether the credential is currently active
